professional_summary: I am a technology enthusiast with a strong focus on data analysis and engineering, currently pursuing a Higher Technical Degree in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence. I possess a solid foundation in Python and SQL, with experience in programming and project development. I am seeking my first IT job opportunity as a Data Engineer or Data Analyst, motivated to learn, grow professionally, and apply my knowledge in an innovative data management environment.
